accessible.heading: Usually free of access barriers
accessible.description: This stop is likely accessible and is reported in working order.

parking.heading: Street parking often blocking curb
parking.description: This stop is often affected by street parking which blocks direct access to the curb.

other-sometimes.heading: Other – sometimes accessible
other-sometimes.description: This stop is only accessible some of the time. Refer to the reviews below for more information.

construction.heading: Construction blocking bus lane or stop
construction.description: This stop is temporarily affected by construction which blocks busses or riders from reaching the stop.

obstacles-temporary.heading: Unavoidable obstacles
obstacles-temporary.description: This stop is temporarily affected by unavoidable obstacles which prevent boarding.

other-temporary.heading: Other – temporarily inaccessible
other-temporary.description: This stop is temporarily inaccessible. Refer to the reviews below for more information.

limited-maneuverability.heading: Limited maneuverability for some riders
limited-maneuverability.description: This stop doesn’t provide enough space to maneuver while using certain types of mobility aids.

poor-conditions.heading: Poor conditions in surrounding areas
poor-conditions.description: This stop has accessibility barriers in the general area surrounding it which may affect connections with transit or destinations.

other-complicated.heading: Other – it's complicated
other-complicated.description: This stop may or may not be accessible depending on your individual circumstances. Refer to the reviews below for more information.

inaccessible.description: This stop has significant access barriers and is not equipped with alternative entryways.

missing-landing.heading: Missing landing pad for ramp deployment
missing-landing.description: This stop doesn’t have an inlet landing pad for the ramp to deploy onto.

uneven-surface.heading: Uneven surface for alighting or deploying
uneven-surface.description: This stop has an uneven or unstable surface which makes it unsuitable to safely board, or which holds the ramp from fully touching down.

lacks-curb.heading: Lacks curb to create shallow ramp angle
lacks-curb.description: This stop doesn’t have a raised curb to aid in creating a suitable ramp angle.

obstacles-permanent.heading: Unavoidable obstacles
obstacles-permanent.description: This stop has permanent, unavoidable obstacles which prevent boarding.

other-inaccessible.heading: Other – not accessible
other-inaccessible.description: This stop is not accessible. Refer to the reviews below for more information.

unknown.description: There isn't any accessibility data available about this stop. Consider adding your own review below.
